tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE patient_health_metrics (
    patient_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    heart_rate INT,
    blood_pressure VARCHAR,
    temperature FLOAT,
    treatment_history TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE patient_health_metrics (
    patient_id INT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    heart_rate INT,
    blood_pressure VARCHAR(10),
    PRIMARY KEY (patient_id, timestamp)
);

CREATE TABLE treatment_history (
    treatment_id INT,
    patient_id INT,
    treatment_text VARCHAR(255),
    treatment_date DATE,
    PRIMARY KEY (treatment_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES patient_health_metrics(patient_id)
);

CREATE TABLE PatientHealthMetrics (
    patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    heart_rate INT NOT NULL,
    blood_pressure INT NOT NULL,
    temperature FLOAT NOT NULL,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE patient_records (
  patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  age INT,
  gender VARCHAR(10),
  address VARCHAR(100),
  admission_date DATE,
  discharge_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE health_metrics (
  metric_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id INT,
  heart_rate INT,
  blood_pressure VARCHAR(20),
  temperature DECIMAL(5,2),
  timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE treatments (
  treatment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id INT,
  treatment_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  physician_name VARCHAR(50),
  treatment_date DATE,
  prescription TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE blockchain_records (
  record_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  transaction_id UUID,
  patient_id INT,
  hash_value VARCHAR(100),
  timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE Patients (
	patient_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
	patient_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
	patient_age INT,
	patient_gender VARCHAR(10),
	patient_address VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE HealthMetrics (
	metric_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
	patient_id UUID REFERENCES Patients(patient_id),
	metric_type VARCHAR(50),
	metric_value FLOAT,
	timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE Treatments (
	treatment_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
	patient_id UUID REFERENCES Patients(patient_id),
	treatment_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
	treatment_date DATE,
	provider_name VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE Doctors (
	doctor_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
	doctor_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
	specialization VARCHAR(50),
	doctor_email VARCHAR(50),
	doctor_phone VARCHAR(15)
);

CREATE TABLE HealthcareHistory (
	history_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
	patient_id UUID REFERENCES Patients(patient_id),
	visit_date DATE,
	doctor_id UUID REFERENCES Doctors(doctor_id),
	diagnosis VARCHAR(100),
	treatment_id UUID REFERENCES Treatments(treatment_id)
);
